topic.title: Plan Check approval of Landscape Design Plan and Irrigation Design Plan

body.p: Following all necessary planning and subdivision approvals, full construction drawings may be submitted to the Building Division for approval through the City's "Plan Check" process. Drawings submitted for Plan Check are to include the entire Landscape Documentation Package as described in Chapter 2.09 of this document, including the Preliminary Landscape Design Plan.
